short_desc: FRMDATEB7L must not be from date before form was released
full_desc: Q0a. FRMDATEB7L (B7L form date) must not be from date before form was released (2017)

test_name: LBSCDRM aligns with LBCAREM on Form D1L, RBD on Form A5D2, and BEREM on Form B9
short_desc: If LBSCDRM = 1 then LBCAREM, RBD, and BEREM should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q3. LBSCDRM (have you ever seen the participant appear to "act out his/her dreams" while sleeping) = 1 (Yes) then Form D1L Q.4b LBCAREM (REM sleep behavior disorder), Form A5D2 Q 5j. RBD (REM sleep behavior disorder) and Form B9 Q12t. BEREM (Participant currently manifests meaningful change in behavior - REM sleep behavior disorder) should not equal 0 (Absent)
test_logic: If LBSCDRM = 1 and (LBCAREM = 0 or RBD = 0 or BEREM = 0)

test_name: LBSCLEGS aligns with LBCALGSL on Form D1L
short_desc: If LBSCLEGS = 1 then LBCALGSL should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q4. LBSCLEGS (Do the participant's legs repeatedly jerk or twitch during sleep) = 1 (Yes) then Form D1L Q4c. LBCALGSL (Periodic leg movements of sleep) should not equal 0 (Absent)

test_name: LBSCBRTH aligns with LBCAAPN on Form D1L and APNEA on Form A5D2
short_desc: If LBSCBRTH = 1 then LBCAAPN and APNEA should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q8. LBSCBRTH (Does the participant ever stop breathing during sleep?) = 1 (Yes) then Form D1L Q4b. LBCAAPN (Obstructive sleep apnea) and  Form A5D2 Q5I. APNEA (Sleep apnea) should not equal 0 (Absent)

short_desc: If LBSCYRS in (0-99) and LBSCYRS[prev_vis] in (0-99), then LBSCYRS should be > LBSCYRS [prev_vis]
full_desc: Q3a1. LBSCYRS (How many years has this been going on?) should not decrease from the last visit
test_logic: If LBSCYRS[prev_vis] and LBSCYRS in (0-99) and LBSCYRS[prev_vis] > LBSCYRS

short_desc: If LBSCINJS[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSCINJS should equal 1
full_desc: If Q3b. LBSCINJS (Has the participant ever been injured from these behaviors) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSCINJS should equal 1 at the current visit.

short_desc: If LBSCINJP[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSCINJP should equal 1
full_desc: If Q3c. LBSCINJP (Has a bedpartner ever been injured from these behaviors) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSCINJP should equal 1 at the current visit.

short_desc: If LBSCWALK[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSCWALK should equal 1
full_desc: If Q6. LBSCWALK (Has the participant ever walked around the bedroom or house while asleep) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSCWALK should equal 1 at the current visit.

short_desc: If LBSCAWAK[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSCAWAK should equal 1
full_desc: If Q7. LBSCAWAK (Has the participant ever snorted or choked him/herself awake) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSCAWAK should equal 1 at the current visit.

short_desc: If LBSCBRTH[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSCBRTH should equal 1
full_desc: If Q8. LBSCBRTH (Does the participant ever seem to stop breathing during sleep) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSCBRTH should equal 1 at the current visit.
